name: Get sync job fails for unprivileged user

error.reason: action [indices:data/read/xpack/connector/sync_job/get] is unauthorized for user [entsearch-unprivileged] with effective roles [unprivileged] on indices [.elastic-connectors-sync-jobs-v1], this action is granted by the index privileges [read,all]

root_cause.reason: action [indices:data/read/xpack/connector/sync_job/get] is unauthorized for user [entsearch-unprivileged] with effective roles [unprivileged] on indices [.elastic-connectors-sync-jobs-v1], this action is granted by the index privileges [read,all]
